title: Charlotte Douglas Airport Increases Parking Rates
summary: Parking rates at Charlotte Douglas Airport are increasing to fund improvements in safety and infrastructure.
charlotte_impact: Rate adjustments impact travelers and airport users, potentially affecting travel costs and convenience.

title: Neshé Conley Advances Maternal Health Equity with AI
summary: WCNC Charlotte highlights Neshé Conley's work using AI to address maternal health disparities during Women's History Month.
charlotte_impact: Conley's work addresses critical health equity issues, potentially improving outcomes for women.

title: Warmer Weather Arrives for Meteorological Spring
summary: Sunday will bring sunshine and temperatures in the 70s after some patchy fog in the morning.
charlotte_impact: Weather impacts daily life and outdoor activities, signaling a change in season.

title: NC Lawmakers Divided Over US-Israel Strikes on Iran
summary: North Carolina lawmakers are split on the US-Israel 'Operation Epic Fury' strikes on Iran, with Republicans supporting and Democrats opposing.
charlotte_impact: Reflects broader national divisions on foreign policy and military actions.

title: Sinkhole Swallows Pickup Truck in Gastonia
summary: A sinkhole near Airline and Brown in Gastonia swallowed an unattended pickup truck overnight; no injuries were reported.
charlotte_impact: Infrastructure failures can pose risks to public safety and property.

title: Charlotte Protesters Rally Against Iran Strikes
summary: A protest against the U.S.-Israeli military strikes on Iran is planned for Romare Bearden Park.
charlotte_impact: Demonstrates local opposition to international military actions.

title: Huntersville Plans to Address Congested Corridor
summary: Huntersville is planning to address traffic congestion on NC-115, a major artery experiencing standstill traffic during rush hour.
charlotte_impact: Traffic congestion impacts commuters and local businesses, necessitating infrastructure improvements.

title: Early Voting Ends Saturday for NC Primary Elections
summary: North Carolina residents have until 3 p.m. Saturday to vote early in the pivotal primary elections.
charlotte_impact: Primary elections determine candidates for key races, influencing future policy decisions.

title: Overnight Shooting in East Charlotte Injures One Critically
summary: A shooting in the 6500 block of E W.T. Harris Boulevard in east Charlotte left one person critically injured.
charlotte_impact: Gun violence poses a significant threat to public safety and community well-being.

title: I-485 Express Lanes Open in Charlotte
summary: The I-485 Express Lanes in south Charlotte are now open, offering drivers a faster option between I-77 and U.S. 74.
charlotte_impact: Express lanes aim to reduce congestion and improve traffic flow for commuters.

title: Woman Dies Weeks After Assault in East Charlotte
summary: A woman has died weeks after being assaulted in east Charlotte. The suspect is in custody as of Feb. 27, 2026.
charlotte_impact: Highlights the serious consequences of violent crime and the importance of justice.

title: Mother and Boyfriend Accused of Assaulting 1-Year-Old
summary: A mother and her boyfriend are accused of assaulting a 1-year-old in Burke County, causing a fractured arm.
charlotte_impact: Child abuse is a serious crime with lasting physical and emotional consequences.

title: CMPD Targets South Charlotte Crime Hotspots
summary: CMPD is focusing on crime hotspots in South Charlotte with 'Queen City Safe' patrols as part of a rebranded safety initiative.
charlotte_impact: Increased police presence aims to deter crime and improve public safety in targeted areas.

title: Man Sentenced for Sexually Abusing a Girl
summary: Maurice Limon Stitt, 42, was sentenced to a lengthy prison term for sexually abusing a girl, even after she reported it.
charlotte_impact: Sexual abuse is a heinous crime, and this case highlights the importance of protecting children.

title: Driver Kills Another in Rock Hill Crash After High-Speed Exit
summary: Joel Laron Smith, 21, is charged with reckless homicide after a crash on I-77 in Rock Hill.
charlotte_impact: Reckless driving can have fatal consequences, emphasizing the need for responsible behavior.
